channel.title: (Class Suggestion) The Harridan
channel.description:
> ## [color=grey]The Harridan[/color] :shield: :wrench: > **[color=grey]Neutral Support[/color]** _A young magician, who is helping inviduals like her with their destiny._ **Natural Instinct (Passive)** - You know an idenity one of the neutrals. **Balance Keeper (Passive)** - You're immune to death once from each source (BD/Neutrals/Unseen/Cult). **Sudden Adjustment (Day)** - Force pardon the player on trial if he's Neutral. He can't accused of treason again that day. - 1 uses **Rune Of Cloak (Day)** - Hide target's visit and make them appear as Blue Dragon tonight,if he's Neutral. - 2 uses **Rune Of Safety (Night)** - Make a barrage that preventing anyone from visiting your target. - 4 uses **Rune Of Power (Night)** - Give a pernament buff for player. It will fails, if the target is not Neutral. - 1 uses(Not usable Until Night 3) *Help more than half of neutrals acomplish their objective.*
The Buff's that a Neutral class can get:
- Fool: Made them suspicous to investigative classes, hide their occupy/redirtection immunity. - Scorned: Frame will make a target suspicious for 2 nights to investigative classes and night immunity for 1 night. - Alchemist: He can heal reaped players who were attacked by Reaper same night, occupy/redirection immunity. - Mercenary: Knowlegde about contact's class and alerting if they got converted. Night immunity once. - Inquisitor: Find Magic always determine if the target is magic user can't be affected by Magic Dust/Magic Cloak and Frame. - Sorcerer: Appear as Blue Dragon to investigative classes, if she wouldn't kill her target she will know the reason (Example:Target was protected by Knight or was member of the Unseen/Cult). - Reaper: Hide his visits, occupy/redirection immunity. - Possessor: A possesed player will be same class but instead he's goal will turn into "Help The Possessor acomplisgh their objective" and also gave a separate night chat. They will die next night, if the Possessor would be killed. - Neutral King: Benefits of Starting King.<---- Looking for replacement.
Note: She can spawn only with at least 2 other Neutrals in game. If the Neutral with "Rune Of Power" will become King he will got a benefit's of Starting King(Except Psycho King).
Any feedback/suggestions to upgrade/change this class is always apprieciate.
Have a nice day!

item.title: (Class Suggestion) The Harridan
item.dc:creator: NOBLE1
item.description:
I kinda like the concept. Neutrals don’t have to be alone. They can decide to work alone or help another faction. That’s the glory of nuetral.

Read full topic

Where did i ignored your points anyway? I just made a correction because there was a possibility you didn’t read it. There is no need for arguing.

item.description:
So because I didn’t look at a note in your OP, you’re going to just ignore the other points I made that are still quite valid?

item.description:
Twil1ight:

Note:

She can spawn only with at least 2 other Neutrals in game.

She can’t spawn with only NK. I already write before posting.

Noted . Thank as lot! Have a nice day!

item.title: (Class Suggestion) The Harridan
item.dc:creator: Whammerist
item.description:
Not only that, the teaming up of Neutrals makes the game ridiculously swingy, aka just bad design

Read full topic

item.title: (Class Suggestion) The Harridan
item.dc:creator: Whammerist
item.description:
Neutrals do not need a team, and they aren’t built with a team in mind.
What happens if Harridan is the only additional Neutral? You’re essentially forcing the Harridan to see to it that the Neutral Killer win. In another game with only Sorc/Inquis, your chance of winning is ridiculously high.

Read full topic

item.title: (Class Suggestion) The Harridan
item.dc:creator: Twil1ight
item.description:
Can i ask about more specific answer? I would be apprieciated.

Read full topic

item.title: (Class Suggestion) The Harridan
item.dc:creator: Whammerist
item.description:
Neutrals are neutral for a reason.
Neat execution but I really dislike this concept from the outset

Read full topic

item.title: (Class Suggestion) The Harridan
item.dc:creator: Twil1ight
item.description:
NOBLE1:

If it’s to keep a Neutral alive then that would go against the fool

Nope, if one the Neutrals is the Fool, she need help him get hanged during a day. Talking about Alchemists she need to help them survive until end of the game. Pretty straight and clear.

Read full topic

item.title: (Class Suggestion) The Harridan
item.dc:creator: Twil1ight
item.description:
Firelitten:

No alch doesn’t want people to survive

Reaper is meant to bypass healing

For a reason.

No

Ok, so what would you change in this?

Read full topic

item.title: (Class Suggestion) The Harridan
item.dc:creator: Firekitten
item.description:
Twil1ight:

Alchemist: He can heal reaped players who were attacked by Reaper same night, occupy/redirection immunity.

No alch doesn’t want people to survive
Reaper is meant to bypass healing
For a reason.

No

Read full topic

item.title: (Class Suggestion) The Harridan
item.dc:creator: NOBLE1
item.description:
Really impressive! So is the goal to help one other Neutral complete their goal or to keep the Neutral alive…? If it’s to keep a Neutral alive then that would go against the fool

Read full topic

item.description:
Twil1ight:

Natural Instinct (Passive) - You know an idenity one of the neutrals

Interesting

Twil1ight:

Balance Keeper (Passive) - You’re immune to death once from each source (BD/Neutrals/Unseen/Cult).

Good passive

Twil1ight:

Sudden Adjustment (Day) - Force pardon the player on trial if he’s Neutral. He can’t accused of treason again that day. - 1 uses

Kind of outs that he is a neut but I mean I guess it’s ok

Twil1ight:

Rune Of Cloak (Day) - Hide target’s visit and make them appear as Blue Dragon tonight,if he’s Neutral. - 2 uses

Good ability

Twil1ight:

Rune Of Safety (Night) - Make a barrage that preventing anyone from visiting your target. - 4 uses

Good

Twil1ight:

Rune Of Power (Night) - Give a pernament buff for player. It will fails, if the target is not Neutral. - 1 uses(Not usable Until Night 3)

Good ability

Twil1ight:

Have a nice day!

Have a nice day too!

Overall pretty good class

item.title: (Class Suggestion) The Harridan
item.dc:creator: Twil1ight
item.description:
The Harridan

Neutral Support
A young magician, who is helping inviduals like her with their destiny.
Natural Instinct (Passive) - You know an idenity one of the neutrals.
Balance Keeper (Passive) - You’re immune to death once from each source (BD/Neutrals/Unseen/Cult).
Sudden Adjustment (Day) - Force pardon the player on trial if he’s Neutral. He can’t accused of treason again that day. - 1 uses
Rune Of Cloak (Day) - Hide target’s visit and make them appear as Blue Dragon tonight,if he’s Neutral. - 2 uses
Rune Of Safety (Night) - Make a barrage that preventing anyone from visiting your target. - 4 uses
Rune Of Power (Night) - Give a pernament buff for player. It will fails, if the target is not Neutral. - 1 uses(Not usable Until Night 3)
Help more than half of neutrals acomplish their objective.

The Buff’s that a Neutral class can get:

  • Fool: Made them suspicous to investigative classes, hide their occupy/redirtection immunity.
  • Scorned: Frame will make a target suspicious for 2 nights to investigative classes and night immunity for 1 night.
  • Alchemist: He can heal reaped players who were attacked by Reaper same night, occupy/redirection immunity.
  • Mercenary: Knowlegde about contact’s class and alerting if they got converted. Night immunity once.
  • Inquisitor: Find Magic always determine if the target is magic user can’t be affected by Magic Dust/Magic Cloak and Frame.
  • Sorcerer: Appear as Blue Dragon to investigative classes, if she wouldn’t kill her target she will know the reason (Example:Target was protected by Knight or was member of the Unseen/Cult).
  • Reaper: Hide his visits, occupy/redirection immunity.
  • Possessor: A possesed player will be same class but instead he’s goal will turn into “Help The Possessor acomplisgh their objective” and also gave a separate night chat. They will die next night, if the Possessor would be killed.
  • Neutral King: Benefits of Starting King.<---- Looking for replacement.

Note:
She can spawn only with at least 2 other Neutrals in game.
If the Neutral with “Rune Of Power” will become King he will got a benefit’s of Starting King(Except Psycho King).

Any feedback/suggestions to upgrade/change this class is always apprieciate.

Have a nice day!

Read full topic
